description:
In the aftermath of the attack on the school, Tesla and Nine confront their father, Black Trader. Meanwhile, Haruka`s in a depressed, guilty funk over Misty Knight`s death, but she`d better snap out of it soon, since Black Trader knows where the last piece of the Seven Amulets is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Driven Into a Corner! The Wish of Each One!
絶体絶命! それぞれの想い
